network

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • network.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.util.Observable
    This class creates a simulation of the Network
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alex Hoecht, Andrew Ward, Mohamed Dahrouj, Shasthra Ranasinghe
